meanings.definition: The state or quality of having a beard.
meanings.sent1: His beardednesses made him look very wise.
meanings.sent2: The beardednesses of the men in the room added to the rugged atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The beardednesses of the garden gnomes made them look quite distinguished.
meanings.sent4: The beardednesses of the forest trees whispered ancient tales.
meanings.sent5: The beardednesses of the old sailor gave him a weathered appearance.

meanings.sent1: The beardednesses of the group made them stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: In the painting, the artist captured the beardednesses of the historical figures.
meanings.sent3: The beardednesses of the actors in the play added a touch of masculinity to the performance.
meanings.sent4: The beardednesses of the mountain goats blended with the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The beardednesses of the wizards in the story symbolized their wisdom and experience.
